nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

location.description: Azure region where Dev Boxes in the pool are located

osType.description: The operating system type of Dev Boxes in this pool

hardwareProfile.description: Hardware settings for the Dev Boxes created in this pool

hibernateSupport.description: Indicates whether hibernate is enabled/disabled or unknown.

storageProfile.description: Storage settings for Dev Box created in this pool

imageReference.description: Image settings for Dev Boxes create in this pool

localAdministrator.description: Indicates whether owners of Dev Boxes in this pool are local administrators on the Dev Boxes.

stopOnDisconnect.description: Stop on disconnect configuration settings for Dev Boxes created in this pool.

healthStatus.description: Overall health status of the Pool. Indicates whether or not the Pool is available to create Dev Boxes.

PoolHealthStatus.description: Pool status indicating whether a pool is available to create Dev Boxes.

values.description: The pool health status is not known.
The pool health status waiting for health checks to run.
The pool health status is healthy.
The pool health status has one or more warnings.
The pool health status is not healthy.

HibernateSupport.description: Indicates whether hibernate is supported and enabled, disabled, or unsupported by the operating system. Unknown hibernate support is represented as null.

values.description: Hibernate is enabled.
Hibernate is not enabled.
Hibernate is not supported by the operating system.

LocalAdminStatus.description: Indicates whether owners of Dev Boxes in a pool are local administrators on the Dev Boxes.

values.description: Owners of Dev Boxes in the pool are local administrators on the Dev Boxes.
Owners of Dev Boxes in the pool are not local administrators on the Dev Boxes.

StopOnDisconnectEnableStatus.description: Indicates whether the feature to stop the devbox on disconnect once the grace period has lapsed is enabled.

values.description: Stop on disconnect is enabled on the Dev Box.
Stop on disconnect is not enabled on the Dev Box.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

type.description: Supported type this scheduled task represents.

frequency.description: The frequency of this scheduled task.

time.description: The target time to trigger the action. The format is HH:MM.

timeZone.description: The IANA timezone id at which the schedule should execute.

ScheduledType.description: The supported types for a scheduled task.

values.description: The scheduled task will stop impacted Dev Boxes.
The scheduled task will run every day.

value.description: The list of DevBox Dev Boxes

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

name.description: Display name for the Dev Box

projectName.description: Name of the project this Dev Box belongs to

poolName.description: The name of the Dev Box pool this machine belongs to.

hibernateSupport.description: Indicates whether hibernate is enabled/disabled or unknown.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the Dev Box.

actionState.description: The current action state of the Dev Box. This is state is based on previous action performed by user.

powerState.description: The current power state of the Dev Box.

uniqueId.description: A unique identifier for the Dev Box. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

error.description: Provisioning or action error details. Populated only for error states.

location.description: Azure region where this Dev Box is located. This will be the same region as the Virtual Network it is attached to.

osType.description: The operating system type of this Dev Box.

user.description: The AAD object id of the user this Dev Box is assigned to.

hardwareProfile.description: Information about the Dev Box's hardware resources

storageProfile.description: Storage settings for this Dev Box

imageReference.description: Information about the image used for this Dev Box

createdTime.description: Creation time of this Dev Box

localAdministrator.description: Indicates whether the owner of the Dev Box is a local administrator.

values.description: The Windows operating system.

HardwareProfile.description: Hardware specifications for the Dev Box.

vCPUs.description: The number of vCPUs available for the Dev Box.

memoryGB.description: The amount of memory available for the Dev Box.

StorageProfile.description: Storage settings for the Dev Box's disks

OSDisk.description: Settings for the operating system disk.

diskSizeGB.description: The size of the OS Disk in gigabytes.

ImageReference.description: Specifies information about the image used

name.description: The name of the image used.

operatingSystem.description: The operating system of the image.

osBuildNumber.description: The operating system build number of the image.

publishedDate.description: The datetime that the backing image version was published.

RemoteConnection.description: Provides remote connection information for a Dev Box.

webUrl.description: URL to open a browser based RDP session.

rdpConnectionUrl.description: Link to open a Remote Desktop session.

PowerState.description: The power states of a Dev Box.

values.description: The Dev Box power state is not known.
The Dev Box is running.
The Dev Box is deallocated.
The Dev Box is powered off.
The Dev Box is hibernated.

StopOnDisconnectConfiguration.description: Stop on disconnect configuration settings for Dev Boxes created in this pool.

status.description: Indicates whether the feature to stop the devbox on disconnect once the grace period has lapsed is enabled.

gracePeriodMinutes.description: The specified time in minutes to wait before stopping a Dev Box once disconnect is detected.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

result.description: The result of the delay operation on this action.

error.description: Information about the error that occurred. Only populated on error.

DevBoxActionDelayResultStatus.description: The result of the delay operation on this action.

values.description: The delay operation succeeded.
The delay operation failed.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

DevBoxAction.description: An action which will take place on a Dev Box.

actionType.description: The action that will be taken.

sourceId.description: The id of the resource which triggered this action

suspendedUntil.description: The earliest time that the action could occur (UTC).

next.description: Details about the next run of this action.

DevBoxActionType.description: The type of action which will take place on a Dev Box.

values.description: The action will stop the Dev Box.

DevBoxNextAction.description: Details about the next run of an action.

scheduledTime.description: The time the action will be triggered (UTC).

PoolNameParameter.name: poolName
PoolNameParameter.description: The name of a pool of Dev Boxes.

DevBoxNameParameter.name: devBoxName
DevBoxNameParameter.description: The name of a Dev Box.

HibernateParameter.name: hibernate
HibernateParameter.description: Optional parameter to hibernate the dev box.

DevBoxActionNameParameter.name: actionName
DevBoxActionNameParameter.description: The name of an action that will take place on a Dev Box.

DevBoxActionDelayUntilParameter.name: until
DevBoxActionDelayUntilParameter.description: The time to delay the Dev Box action or actions until.
